Re 神鱼分享关于 DAI 的收益策略：将 ETH 质押换取 wstETH，然后在 MakerDAO 质押 wstETH 铸造 DAI，最后将 DAI 存入 DSR。目前投入 1,000 ETH，一年约可以赚取 50 ETH 和 25k DAI，同时获得币本位和 U 本位现金流。https://twitter.com/bitfish1/status/1688416706622849024?s=20
DiscusFish: 展开讲一下吧：先将ETH质押换取wstETH，然后在MKRDao中质押wstETH以生成DAI，最后将DAI存入DSR。目前投入1000ETH，一年可以赚取50个ETH和25k的DAI。这样，就同时得到了币本位和法币本位的现金流，稳稳的幸福。

Bob Elliott: Recent low US productivity growth is a critical driver of entrenched inflation. Never before has job growth outpaced real GDP growth for years, not even the 70s. While part was supply chain related, if this extends it will have profound implications few are thinking about.

紧跟学习一番CRV最近的状况，7月都在外面玩 落下了很多亏钱机会
olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi. As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount. Risks explained 🧵
